p: In order to prepare the structure of the protein, the protein preparation wizard tool of Maestro version 10.2 was used. The back chains and missing side of the protein were included. On default settings and OPLS3 force field, the protein was minimized (Desmond, n.d.; Meng et al., 2011). Water molecules beyond 5.0 Å were removed to avoid hindrance in the binding region.
